name: Jackie (Lovemond, USA)
description:
Congratulations! Your application for our highly sought after black companion, JACKIE, has been approved. Before we can begin processing your order, we have some specifications to make to your JACKIE. It shouldn’t take long, but will make all the difference.

While you’re making adjustments, you will be able to see a mock-up of what your JACKIE will look like, and how these changes will affect your JACKIE’s personality traits. These are calibrated to make your JACKIE experience as authentic as possible.
